transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir, Elma baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART head office se.

Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir, aapse subah mein Bhumika ji ki baat hui thi, aapke account manager se. To sir, aapne feedback unsatisfied diya tha, kya problem aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Last ek saal se maine registration karaya hai IndiaMART mein madam.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ek bhi order nahi mila hai mere ko.
Executive: Achcha. To aapne complaint to ki complaint ka kya tha sir aapne complaint to ki thi yaha pe.
Customer: Mail kiya tha beech mein dekh lijiye madam.
Executive: Sir, main waise to dekh rahi hu yaha pe aapne nahi kiya but theek hai. Problem kya aa rahi hai sir? Lead nahi mil rahi aapko aapke product ki?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Achcha. Aapko sir ek cheez bata rahi thi ki aapko 100 kilometer ke area ka hi sirf chahiye aisa kya?
Customer: Haan, sirf 100 se 150. 100 kilometer.
Executive: Like 100 thoda sa area limited ho jata hai kaafi zyada.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: At least 200 250 kilometer tak jaaiye ki at least aapko kuch lead ye Patan Patan ki lead ka kya hai sir?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Patan ki Patan Gujarat ki.
Customer: Madam Gujarat dur pad jata hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Bhai sahab.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Dur pad jata hai madam.
Executive: Achcha. Kaun kaun se area hai sir yaha pe jo lead hai. Sir dekhiye ek cheez main bataungi ki dekhiye area aapka bahut limited hai jo aap keh rahe hain 100 kilometer ka. Theek hai? Agar thoda sa area hum kare sir yaha pe kuch lead agar aap bataiye mujhe lead aapke kaam ki hai to main aapko share karti hu. Ye Sabarkantha ki sir?
Customer: Sabarkata Gujarat mein padta hai madam.
Executive: Haan Gujarat mein.
Customer: Bahut dur hai 400 500 kilometer 400 kilometer.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Sir aapko Rajasthan ki chahiye proper main aapko bata deti hu Rajasthan ke liye.

Executive: Udaipur uttar kya padega?
Customer: Udaipur paas mein.
Executive: Isme kar sakte hain?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To Udaipur se lead aayi hai sir.
Customer: Kitni lead hai madam?
Executive: Aapki aayi hai sir.

Customer: Main check kar leta hu theek hai madam.
Executive: Sir ek second main aapka time dungi dekhiye actually kya hai aapse baat hui thi to aapne bola ki nahi aaya aur fir aapne unsatisfied kar diya tha na ki aapko nahi conversion mil raha hai. To main usi department se call kar rahi hu main unki manager call kar rahi hu ki aapko agar aapne unsatisfied diya to main aapko at least help kar saku sir ki kahan pe problem aapko lag rahi hai. Ab agar aap jo keh rahe ho ki aapko Udaipur se aap lead uthate ho theek hai to ek bar aap jo sir aap mujhe thoda ek do cheeze bata do filter kahan se lagate ho sir kaun sa filter lagate ho aap jab lead check karte ho to?
Executive: Koi filter lagate hain sir?
Customer: Filter lagate hain Rajasthan ka madam.
Executive: Haan Rajasthan ka lagate hain. To Rajasthan mein agar aap keh rahe hain ki main Udaipur mein kar sakta hu Sumerpur mein kar sakte hain Sumerpur industrial area mein?
Customer: Nahi wo dur hai madam.
Executive: Achcha Jaipur ka?
Customer: Jaipur 300 kilometer dur hai.
Executive: Achcha Bharatpur Jhunjhunu?
Customer: Bharatpur bhi dur hai madam.
Executive: Jhunjhunu sir?
Customer: Wo bhi dur hai.
Executive: Achcha Lalsot? Lalsot?
Customer: Wo bhi Lalsot near by kya dikha raha hai? Are white kitni hai na duri. Lalsot ka hi area hai sir Rajasthan ka dikha raha hai.
Customer: Kyunki near by Lalsot koi nahi hai area wo bhi dur hi hai.
Executive: Matlab Lal Lalsot ka ek baat bataiye sir aap system pe aate hain kya?
Customer: Lunch kar raha hu abhi madam.
Executive: To kab call kar sakti hu sir? Dekhiye maine call isiliye call kiya ki sir aapko nahi conversion mila ya not satisfied kiya isiliye call kiya aapko ki agar aapne diya hai to kahan problem lag rahi hai ki hum usko theek kare sir ya aapko help kare us cheez mein.
Customer: Theek karne mein madam 11 mahine chale gaye.
Executive: Sir dekhiye aap aap se connectivity nahi hui ek bar aap aa jaiye system pe to main aapko properly thoda sa lead dikha deti hu kyuki agar aap Udaipur mein deal karte hain to uski to bahut sari lead hai sir.
Customer: Mere ko 30 minute ke baad call back karoge madam?
Executive: Chaliye theek hai main karti hu aapko call.
Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received any orders in a year.

- Wants leads only within 100-150 km radius.



Resolution:

- Executive tried to understand the customer's requirements.

- Executive offered to share leads from nearby areas.

- Executive offered to show leads on system.

- Agreed to call back after 30 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after 30 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, location, area
